h2_title: Yaoguai Queen Boss Fight - Violet Spider
content: The Violet Spider will often begin the fight with a signature webbing attack, shooting out several strands in a large frontal arc that you'll need to dodge or you'll waste time getting stuck and having to free yourself while being unable to do much else. Even if you do dodge the initial blast, there will be a web coating on the ground where the attack land that will slow you considerably, and you'll want to move the fight away from such spots as much as possible.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Lower Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Queen Boss Fight - Violet Spider'.
The content is as follows:
The Violet Spider will often begin the fight with a signature webbing attack, shooting out several strands in a large frontal arc that you'll need to dodge or you'll waste time getting stuck and having to free yourself while being unable to do much else. Even if you do dodge the initial blast, there will be a web coating on the ground where the attack land that will slow you considerably, and you'll want to move the fight away from such spots as much as possible.
